title: EXT_feature_metadata glTF extension
description: glTF extension that assigns metadata to features in a model.

schema.description: An object defining classes and enums.

schemaUri.description: A uri to an external schema file.

statistics.description: An object containing statistics about features.

featureTables.description: A dictionary, where each key is a feature table ID and each value is an object defining the feature table.

featureTextures.description: A dictionary, where each key is a feature texture ID and each value is an object defining the feature texture.
